title: High-Pitched Brake Squeal at Low Speed
symptom_short: Squealing noise when braking lightly at low speed

likely_causes.cause: Brake wear indicator contacting rotor (pads near end of life)
likely_causes.notes: Designed to make noise as a warning.
Often after overheating or aggressive braking.

likely_causes.cause: Brake dust or light rust on rotors
likely_causes.notes: Common after sitting or in humid conditions.

recommended_checks: Check rotor surface for glazing or rust.
Have brakes serviced if noise persists.
safety_warning: If noise turns into grinding, stop driving and inspect brakes immediately.

title: Grinding or Scraping Noise When Braking
symptom_short: Loud grinding or metal-on-metal noise when braking

likely_causes.cause: Brake pads worn completely to metal backing plates

recommended_checks: Avoid driving except to reach a safe location.
safety_warning: Grinding brakes can lead to brake failure and loss of stopping ability.

title: Soft or Spongy Brake Pedal
symptom_short: Brake pedal feels soft, spongy, or goes too far down

likely_causes.notes: Often after brake service or fluid loss.

recommended_checks: Check brake fluid level and condition.
Inspect for leaks near wheels and master cylinder.
Do not drive if pedal feels unsafe.
safety_warning: A soft pedal can indicate imminent brake failure. Tow the vehicle if necessary.

title: Brake Pedal Pulsation or Steering Wheel Shake
symptom_short: Pedal pulsates or steering wheel shakes during braking

likely_causes.cause: Wheel hub runout or improper installation

recommended_checks: Measure rotor thickness variation and runout.
Inspect hub surfaces for rust or debris.
Resurface or replace rotors if needed.
safety_warning: Severe vibration can reduce braking control, especially at high speeds.

title: ABS Warning Light On
symptom_short: ABS warning light stays on while driving

likely_causes.cause: Damaged sensor wiring or tone ring

recommended_checks: Scan ABS module for fault codes.
Inspect wheel speed sensors and wiring.
Check for related traction control warnings.
safety_warning: Normal braking usually remains, but ABS may not function during hard stops.

title: Parking Brake Stuck or Not Releasing
symptom_short: Vehicle drags or will not move after parking brake release
symptom_patterns: car won't move after parking brake

likely_causes.notes: Common in cold or wet climates.

likely_causes.cause: Corroded rear caliper or drum mechanism

recommended_checks: Inspect cables and rear brake mechanisms.
Avoid driving long distances if brakes are dragging.
safety_warning: Dragging brakes can overheat and cause brake failure or fire.
